Looked very weird. Anyway the question i want to ask is what do you think of mirrors?

7.26.20  10:58 pm   Why you are so wholesome and lovely to be honest? Also, your vids has been making me feel better due to depression and stuff like that, y'know what I mean. Kinda wanted to thank you for what you have done to make not only me, but literally everyone who it is in the same situation as I.
7.26.20  10:02 pm   hi bill. listened to new canaan for the first time in a few years and started crying. unrelated but i have a really bad sunburn. thank you
7.26.20  9:55 pm   have you ever gotten around to talking about velcro?

7.26.20  8:47 pm   hi bill. i have to say, i really enjoy your music. i have advanced music theory knowledge and your music continues to intrigue me. i guess living under a rock pays off, huh? the freshness, originality, and flow is just amazing; it truly sounds like your music is coming out of independent creativity and not by some corporate bullshit. that's what music is all about, right?

     
that being said, you are one of my biggest inspirations. i can play several instruments, but i can't seem to go farther than cover some songs; i don't know where to start for original creations that i can be satisfied with. i've seen some in depth analysis of your music:
https://www.hooktheory.com/theorytab/view/bill-wurtz/i-just-did-a-bad-thing
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-0Bw2Rg5nFQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1c15ecCCmbs
and it seems like your music is very complicated. you've mentioned that every song for you is planned out in whole bef orehand, but for me, i can't seem to come up with anything that is melodic or harmonically satisfying to me. do you have any suggestions for me? appreciate it!
7.26.20  8:36 pm   Have you considered making art with a much darker tone?
